projectinformation: Constant Guard is a suite provided by Comcast Xfinity to its customer for no additional cost. It provides protection against malware on internet.

Bookspan operate 19 book clubs spanning a wide variety of fiction and non-fiction genres. Many of bookspan's club have been in operation for more than 50 years. Unlike other online bookstores, their clubs carry a limited selection of only the best books in each category. We evaluate hundreds of new books each month, but select only 5-10 new books to make available in each club each month. Our goal is to help our members discover their next great read.

KPMG is one of the largest professional services companies in the world and one of the Big Four auditors. They provide Audit, Advisory and Tax services.
